availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas J. Terry (Harrison County, Ky, farmer)

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Susan Terry. Father of Newton Terry, Jasper Terry, Medora Terry, Berenice Terry, Alice Terry, and Pamelia Terry. Owned five enslaved persons in Harrison County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Harrison County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 2, p. 479.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 2, p. 395.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, p. 110B.
